snippet.title: Lloyd the Monkey 3: Development Journal (5/6/2022)
snippet.description:
Summer break is almost here for those in my neck of the woods, and what better way to mark the occasion than with the first video development journal for Lloyd the Monkey 3: Judgement Day?

This video will show the opening and hub stages for both characters in this Unity-developed game, as well as some code and a demonstration of the rotoscoping process.

If you like what you see, please subscribe to my Patreon at patreon.com/MeyerGames, and get all future videos one week early for as little as $1.
#Lloyd3 #Unity
